languages.text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
languages.original_text: Псайкер тратит на следующую {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше, после того как спровоцировал появление {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морока{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g} впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

traits.locale_text: After triggering a psychic phenomena or perils of the warp, the Psyker's next psychic power costs -1 less action point.

traits.locale_text: Псайкер тратит на следующую психосилу на 1 ОД меньше, после того как спровоцировал появление пси-морока или угроз варпа.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}首次触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}之后，灵能者下个{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每回合首次触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}之后，灵能者下个灵能力量消耗的行动点数降低1点。

languages.text: Tras desencadenar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} por primera vez cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, si siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} menos.
languages.original_text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tras desencadenar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} por primera vez cada turno, si siguiente poder psíquico cuesta 1 punto de acción menos.

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、初めて{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}<歪み>の危険{/g}が発生した後、異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が-1される。
languages.original_text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 各ターン、初めて{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}<歪み>の危険{/g}が発生した後、異能者の次の超能力の消費APが-1される。

languages.text: Après le déclenchement de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} pour la première fois lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le prochain {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} du psyker coûte -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g}.
languages.original_text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Après le déclenchement de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} pour la première fois lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le prochain {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} du psyker coûte -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g}.

languages.text: Nach dem ersten Auslösen von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomenen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} kostet die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} des Psionikers −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g} weniger.
languages.original_text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem ersten Auslösen von {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionischen Phänomenen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} in jedem Zug kostet die nächste psionische Kraft des Psionikers -1 Aktionspunkt weniger.

languages.text: Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} ilk kez {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}ruhsezi fenomeni{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikeleri{/g} tetiklendikten sonra, ruhsezerin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücünün{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} bedeli 1 azalır.
languages.original_text: After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} first time each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
